\n\n", "creator": "Telumire", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Settings", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/LinksIcon/settings", "modified": "20230508110334719", "modifier": "Telumire", "caption": "Links Icon" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/LinksIcon/style": { "created": "20221026155718215", "text": "\\rules except dash\n\\define this() $:/plugins/Telumire/LinksIcon/style\n\\define static-output()\n/* Static rules for better performances*/\n\n<$list filter=\"[[$:/tags/Image]tagging[]has[domain]]\" variable=\"link\">\na:is(<$list filter=\"[each:list-item[domain]encodeuri[]]\" counter=\"domain\">[href*=\"{{!!title}}\"]{{{ [match[no]then[,]] }}}):{{!!side}}{\nvertical-align: baseline;\ncontent:\"\";\n<$tiddler tiddler=<> \n><$let \nimage={{!!text}} type={{!!type}} uri={{!!_canonical_uri}}\nexternal={{{ [[color:transparent;--mask:unset;--url:url(]] [] [[)]] +[join[]] }}}\nbase64={{{ [[color:transparent;--mask:unset;--url:url(data:]][{!!type}][[;base64,]][][[)]]+[join[]] }}}\nsvg={{{ [[--mask:url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,')]]+[join[]search-replace:g[#],[%23]search-replace:g[\n],[]]}}}\n><$text text={{{ [!is[blank]then]~[!is[blank]!search[svg]then]~[
    \n<$list filter=\"[has[domain]]\">\n
  • <$link class=\"no-icon\"> <$list filter=\"[enlist{!!domain}]\" counter=\",\"><$text text={{!!title}}/><$text text={{{ [<,-last>match[no]then[,]] }}}/>
    • \n\n
\n\n<$button dragFilter=\"[has[domain]]\">Export icons\n\n;Tools to create your own icons\n\n* https://yqnn.github.io/svg-path-editor/\n* https://www.photopea.com/", "creator": "Telumire", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/LinksIcon/TLDR", "modified": "20230508110334719", "modifier": "Telumire", "tags": "" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/templates/readme": { "created": "20230427230707020", "text": "<$list filter=\"[{!!title}split[/]first[4]join[/]]\" variable=\"plugin\">\n<$list filter=\"[]:filter[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsearch:tags[$:/tags/ControlPanel]]\">\n\n\n<>\n\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsuffix[FAQ]limit[1]]\">\n\n;FAQ\n\n
    \n<$list filter=\"[{!!title}tagging[]sort[list]]\">\n
  • \n
    <$link><$text text={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}}/>\n<$transclude mode=\"block\"/>\n
    \n
    • \n\n

Your help is critical to the future of this plugin. Keep it alive and thriving by showing your support on [[Ko-fi|https://ko-fi.com/telumire]] today! ðŸ¤—\n<<<\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/styles/openControlPanelTab": { "created": "20230425225538415", "text": ".tc-tiddlylink.tc-tiddlylink-shadow{cursor:pointer;}", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/styles/openControlPanelTab", "modified": "20230508110327555" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/macros/openControlPanelTab": { "created": "20230424221125460", "text": "\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-actions()\n\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/tab-1749438307\" text=<> />\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/tab--1963855381\" text=<> />\n<$action-navigate $to=<>/>\n\n\\end\n\n\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-separator()<$list filter=\"[!match[yes]]\"><$text text=<<__separator__>>/>\n\n\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-template(separator) <$tiddler tiddler=<> ><$button tag=\"a\" actions=<> class=\"tc-tiddlylink tc-tiddlylink-shadow\"><$transclude field=\"caption\"><$transclude field=\"title\"/><>\n\n\\define link-to-controlpanel-tab(caption:\"\"\"<$list filter=\"$:/ControlPanel [] []\" counter=\"depth\" variable=\"navigateTo\">< \">>\"\"\",prefix,sub-tab)\n<$let\nprefix={{{ [<__prefix__>!is[blank]]:else[{!!title}split[/]first[4]join[/]] }}} \nsub-tab={{{ [<__sub-tab__>!is[blank]]:else[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsearch:tags[$:/tags/ControlPanel]] }}}\nmain-tab={{{ [tags[]prefix[$:/tags/ControlPanel/]trim[$:/tags/]] :map[[$:/tags/ControlPanel]tagging[]search{!!title}] }}}\ntv-wikilinks=\"no\"\n><<__caption__>>\n\\end", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/macros/openControlPanelTab", "modified": "20230508110326908", "code-body": "yes" }} }
